title: Beyond gold: the chemoenhancing mechanism and therapeutic potential of auranofin in melanoma.
abstract: The objective of the current study was to evaluate the chemosensitizing capacity of auranofin (AF), a gold (I) complex traditionally used in rheumatoid arthritis treatment, in potentiating the cytotoxic effects of doxorubicin (DOX) in melanoma cell models, specifically drug-sensitive (B16F10) and multidrug-resistant (B16F10/ADR) variants.
